sect2.title: C++ 200x
sect2.para: This table is based on the table of contents of ISO/IEC Doc No: N2857=09-0047 Date: 2009-03-23 Working Draft, Standard for Programming Language C++

In this implementation -std=gnu++0x or -std=c++0x flags must be used to enable language and library features. The pre-defined symbol __GXX_EXPERIMENTAL_CXX0X__ is used to check for the presence of the required flag.
This page describes the C++0x support in mainline GCC SVN, not in any particular release.

row.entry: May use configure-generated stdint.h via GCC_HEADER_STDINT
Template function and function template bind
Engines and engine adaptors with predefined parameters
